titles.title: A bill to amend title 28, United States Code, to provide for the appointment of one additional district judge for the District of Connecticut.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Amends the Federal judicial code to increase the number of district court judgeships for the District of Connecticut from six to seven.
